American Football Evolved from Soccer and Rugby
The First Football Game Was Played in 1869 Between Rutgers and Princeton
Football Is the Most Popular Game in the United States
The NFL Governs Professional Play in the United States
The Super Bowl Is the Championship NFL Football Game
The Pittsburgh Steelers Have the Most Super Bowl Wins
College Players Are Drafted into Teams
The NFL Is Made Up of 32 Teams in Two Conferences, NFC and AFC
Each Team Needs at Least 11 Players
